title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions and pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via the same REST endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and embedders for chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’) with file uploads, multimodal, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, delete.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, Weaviate vector DB and RAG ingestion pipelines.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot frontend that talks to local Ollama; dark/light themes, markdown, streaming.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Python repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain in 50 lines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with async streaming, chat, and model management; NuGet package.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app exposing Ollama as REST/chat endpoints with user quotas, rate-limit, and admin dashboard.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js wrapper around Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, embeddings, model pull.

title: ollama-python on PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package providing Pythonic access to Ollama chat, generate, embeddings, and model ops.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama with strongly-typed requests/responses and tokio streaming support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.
